title: My game's not starting
body: Can someone give me some troubleshooting advice please?

replies.body: i thought it was my computer i restarted like 3 times to find out its not me

> [{quoted}](name=Jaelyn,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xOkQlHEn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-10-02T00:25:37.336+0000)
>
> i thought it was my computer i restarted like 3 times to find out its not me

it's a relief to know it's not a problem on either of our ends at least, right?

> [{quoted}](name=thefatlazycat,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xOkQlHEn,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-10-02T00:29:34.494+0000)
>
> it's a relief to know it's not a problem on either of our ends at least, right?

for sure i just wish they fixed it soon but looks like its been at least 2+ hours since ppl started having this problem so i guess i have to sleep on it D:
mine either and im angry look at server status >:(((

I fixed it. Go to your C:\Riot Games\ (or wherever you have league installed.) Find Riot Client, and rename it for now. This will let you launch the old somewhat more reliable login screen. [Like this](https://i.imgur.com/Hzlrv40.png) If it still doesnt work, try going to and running C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe

> [{quoted}](name=Swinney,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xOkQlHEn,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-10-02T00:58:09.272+0000)
>
> I fixed it. Go to your C:\Riot Games\ (or wherever you have league installed. Find Riot Client, and rename it for now. This will let you launch the old somewhat more reliable login screen. [Like this](https://i.imgur.com/Hzlrv40.png)

doesn't seem to be working for me, the thing just tells me that it's unable to find RiotClientServices.exe

> [{quoted}](name=thefatlazycat,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xOkQlHEn,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-10-02T01:08:40.618+0000)
>
> doesn't seem to be working for me, the thing just tells me that it's unable to find RiotClientServices.exe

try going to and running C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe

> [{quoted}](name=Swinney,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=xOkQlHEn,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-10-02T01:10:02.625+0000)
>
> try going to and running C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe

alright, it seems to be working now, thank you very much for the help

No problem I hope it gets to working for everyone else.
What exactly happens and how are you trying to start the executable?
